title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 4, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 4, 2022
description:
Adam and Mark connect for the first time in 2022 to discuss the recent verdicts in the Maxwell & Holmes cases they've been following the last few weeks and discuss some state Supreme Court rulings that Mark has had his eye on. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
